short_description: bellanomi is a cosmetics store based in chattanooga, tennessee, united states.
long_description: to help you feel and look your best, we have developed a range of clean beauty products using a blend of centuries-old african practices, powerful ingredients sourced from africa, and scientific research. our skin care products combine centuries-old african techniques, african-sourced ingredients and modern-day science to create clean beauty essentials that empower you to feel and look your best. bellanomi brings together nourishing african botanicals with powerful actives that are formulated to moisturize dry skin, soothe inflammation and clear hyperpigmentation. here at bellanomi , we believe that true beauty lies in showcasing who you are. our goal is to reflect the beauty traditions of africa by providing botanical skincare solutions that help your skin look and feel its best. we're harnessing the power of unisex products which are here to promote clean beauty for all. helps you take control of your beauty routine and unveil renewed, healthy skin. tested methods and ingredients to bring you simple yet effective african skin care products.

generated_description: bellanomi is a skincare company based in chattanooga, tennessee, founded by amanda, a pharmacist with over 12 years of experience in pharmacy practice and cosmetic science. the company specializes in creating skincare products that cater to the unique aging needs of melanin-rich skin. bellanomi combines traditional african practices with modern scientific knowledge to offer a range of nourishing and eco-friendly beauty products. the company sources its ingredients primarily from small businesses in africa, ensuring authenticity and sustainability in its offerings. bellanomi's product line includes body care items such as exfoliating sponges, moisturizing creams, and body oils, designed to address issues like dry skin and hyperpigmentation.
